p: Table 1 presents the total content of glucans, α-glucans, and β-glucans in the studied mushrooms. Total glucan (α-glucan+ β-glucan+ d-glucose from oligosaccharides and sucrose, and free d-glucose) content in mushrooms ranged from 11.4 g/100 g DM in Macrolepiota procera to 45.9 g/100 g DM in Pleurotus ostreatus.
